title: Heart Mechanic
description: When Lisa goes to Kerry with the request to restore her brotherâ€™s wretched car, Kerry sees an opportunity to get closer to the young woman who has tantalized her dreams for so long. Lisa is a caring loving young woman, who is very intelligent and good looking.  What Kerry and Lisa discover together is that there is a darkness, an empty chill, inside Lisa which threatens their relationship at the core.  This is a Lesbian romance, meaning that there is going to be F/F sex. Strong grief issues are also addressed. This is also an erotic novella.
author: Donna Dean
